tweets.text:
Random Memory...

I was VERY Excited to go to see @kidcapri101 - This Was in Wilmington, NC.
Then Someone just Had to Shoot a Gun.

Kid Capri Kept in Rockin, and said "One More Shot, We Are Gonna Get Shut Down...

Well, Someone did, and it Got Shut Down.

I was 14 and SO MAD.

5 “Mom when are you coming outside?”

Me “In just a minute.”

5 “Hurry! I can’t wait to be with you.”

Me “....are you waiting to spray me with the water gun again?”

5 “.....Um No. Ugh. Yes. Thanks a lot for ruining my surprise for you”
